betterquesting:10.desc:8:
After working for so many days, you can now finally rest.
beware of the phantoms -nvm its 1.12.2
Place down the bed and right click it in order to set your spawnpoint and skip the night
you might want to skip nights in order to survive, at least in the beginning

if you are not afraid enough of the night, always remember that there are 
-special mobs
-champions
-infernal mobs
-ender zoo
these are quite some hefty hitters
